bibl.title: with the assistance of S.P. Vleeming, The Eponymous Priests of Ptolemaic Egypt. Chronological Lists of the Priests of Alexandria and Ptolemais with a Study of the Demotic Transcriptions of Their Names.
bibl.seg: Clarysse Willy and G. van der Veken, with the assistance of S.P. Vleeming, The Eponymous Priests of Ptolemaic Egypt. Chronological Lists of the Priests of Alexandria and Ptolemais with a Study of the Demotic Transcriptions of Their Names. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXIV.)

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 58 (1983) Nos 115-116, pp. 270-271. - Carla Balconi, Aegyptus 67 (1987) pp. 270-271. - Wolfgang Brunsch, WZKM 77 (1987) pp. 147-155. - Edmond Van 't Dack, RHD 53 (1985) pp. 384-386. - Robert S. Bianchi, JAOS 106 (1986) pp. 828-829. - Robert S. Bianchi, JAOS 106 (1986) pp. 828-829. - Heinz Heinen, Gnomon 61 (1989) pp. 557-559.
